Radio Television Groupe Avenir (RTG@) bụ ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn nke Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ọ bụ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ Groupe L'Avenir, tinyere akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa ụbọchị L'Avenir
nke otu ahụ na nke netwọk ahụ bụ Pius Muabilu
E Ụlọ ọrụ RTS @ dị na etiti Kinshasa's district nke La Gombe Onye isi otu na netwọk bụ Pius Muabilu.hiwere netwọk ahụ na 2003.
RTG@ TV na-agbasa ozi na UHF channel 45 na Kinshasa, na n'Africa niile na Intelsat 4 satellite telivishọn
Usoro telivishọn Ivorienne Ma Famille bụ akụkụ nke usoro RTG@.
